Articles.Content:
hey guys i really need help with getting this mod to work i tried but it wouldnt work in game so i was wondering if someone could give me a quick tutorial. thanks

hers the link:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/isa-mapsat-3-3-4/

It's outdated, try this one http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/9396-0-20-ISA-MapSat-4-0-Dev-Build if it's released and you can try the dev build: http://www.workshopofthings.com/downloads/ISA_MapSat%20X4r1.zip put the folder inside of the zip in your gamedata folder

Edited June 19, 2013 by asdier
Odd, the spaceport version is working for me.

Not for me spaceport version didn't work. But I installed the mod juste after 0.20 update. May be fixed now.

Got the mod from Innerswant blog.
Yeah 3.3.4 worked but wouldn't save any progress on the maps. Well, it would but it seemed to start with new .pngs every time I started the game. I switched to 4r1 and it works fine.
